unnormalised: Bore, tumka differential calculus-an tras zata? Chinta korunk naka, amche bhitor je ut'tom teankuy to anubhav asa! To itloch kitem tor kosli-i vostu kitli vegim bodolta tem sodun kaddchem. Kiteak, tumi Mumbai-Pune expressway-cher zorin vetat mhunn chintat. Tumchi gaddichi speedometer tumi *atchak* kitle vegim vetat tem sangta - tem eka point-acher derivative bhaxen asta. Calculus mukhel rupan tumka hem "tatkalik" veg sodun kaddpak dita, zalearui tem satat bodolta. Mast, nhoi?
normalised: Bore, differential calculus tumkam zodd zata? Chinta kor naka, amche modle boreant boreankui anubhav asa! Tech porim chint: kiteim kitlench vegim bodlotai tem sodun kaddchem mhonnlear. Udharonnak, tum Mumbai-Pune expressway-cher vegim veta mhonn chint. Tumchea gaddyechem speedometer tumi kiteim vegim choltat tem sangta – tem eka pointacher derivative asat tench. Calculus tumkam tem "tatpurte" veg chitruk kortat, tem satot bodlot aslem torui. Bare, nhoi?

unnormalised: Differential calculus, tachea mul’tatvacher, derivatives sodun kaddpachea bhovtonnim firta. Tumkam xallentlem dy/dx vhastu ugddas asa? Tem mullantuch ‘x-achem tulnen y-achem bodlopachem dor.’ Tem oxem chintat: ‘y’ tumi kitlo ontor bhonvlo tem dakoita ani ‘x’ vell dakhoita, zalear dy/dx mhunnje tumchi speed! Zalearui ontor 'y' ek guntaguntichea ritin bodolta, calculus tumkam khoincheai eka kxannak speed sodun kaddpak sadhna dita, mhunnche x = 2.5 seconds.
normalised: Differential calculus-ant, derivatives sodunc zata. Tumkam school-antlem d y divided by d x vostu ugddas asa? Tem ‘yachem x-achea sandarbant bodolchem dar’ mhonnlear. Tech porim chint: ‘y’ tumi kitench pois pois bhonvleat tem chitrunk korta ani ‘x’ tem vell chitrunk korta, zalear d y divided by d x tumchem veg asata! Torui pois ‘y’ ek dompedd zago assa, calculus tumkam kitem veg sodunc upakari poddta mhonnlear, x don point panch second.

unnormalised: Atam, thodde niyam asat, bore. Power rule, product rule, chain rule... bhirantikar dista, punn te fokot shortcut-och asat. Power rule sangta d/dx(x^n) = n*x^(n-1). Pollayat? Titlench vaitt na. Uprant chain rule asa, d/dx [f(g(x))] = f'(g(x)) * g'(x), jem composite functions-ank samballta - functions dusrea functions-anchea *bhitoren*. Hem niyamancher prabhutv mellovop mhunnje te IIT-JEE problemyacher ut'tirnn zavpachi chavi.
normalised: Atam, theravlli asat, nischit rupan. Power rule, product rule, chain rule... bhirant dita, punn te fokot shortcuts asat. Power rule sangta d divided by d x of x to the power of n n times x to the power of n minus one tench asata mhonnlear. Distai? Itlench vaitt nhoi. Atam chain rule asa, d divided by d x of f of g of x f prime of g of x times g prime of x, tem composite functions-ak zata - dusrea functions bhitor functions. Hea theravllink odhikari zaunk zai I-I-T-J-E-E problems-ak.

unnormalised: Hem khorench khoim vaporta? Sogllekodden! Engineers tem pul ani imarot bandpak vapurtat. Arthshastri bazaarache dhoronn andaz korpak vapurtat. Doktorui rogancho prosar dakhovpak vapurtat. COVID chea cases-anchea graph-acher ugddas asa je voir ani sokol voitale? Calculus tencheza andazanchea fattim axil'lem. Tem machine learning algorithms-anuy vaparta zoim gradients differential calculus-achea techniq vaprun optimize kortat model-achea chuka komi korpak.
normalised: Hea vostuncho vapor khoim zata? Soglle kodden! Engineers pul ani imaroti design korunc vapor kortat. Economists market trends suchovunc vapor kortat. Doctorkui rogacho fankar vaprunk vaportat. Ugddas asa tumkam C-O-V-I-D cases unch ani sokol gelea te graph? Calculus te suchovnank fattim aslem. Tem machine learning algorithms-ant vapor zata zoim gradients-ak differential calculus techniques vaprunk optimize kortat model-ant chukkam komi korunc.

unnormalised: Tornn, tumi tacher koxe bore zatat? Vyayam, vyayam, vyayam! Mukhylea formulanchea sangata survat korat ani uprant vhodd problemyacher kam korat. Tumchea RD Sharma textbookantle soglle vyayam sodoyat. Ani tumchea shikxakancher vo class-mitrancher modot magpak bhinat naka. Kaddoch study group bandhat ani te kothinn problemyancher ekamekachea sangata jhuzat. Don dokem mhunnje eka poros borech, bhai!
normalised: Zalear, tum koxem borem zaunk zata? Vapor, vapor, vapor! Basic formulas-chea sangata suru kor ani tanntun kotthin problems-chea disa vatt dhor. Tumchea R-D Sharma textbook-antleo sogllio korni kor. Ani tumchea teachers vhoddle bhava bhoyank sodunc bhiena naka. Bore estudaranchi zomo boro ani kotthin problems eksarke sodrun kaddat. Don mathem eksarke eka poros bore, bhai!

unnormalised: Nimanne, differential calculus ek xoktixali sadhan jem tumka tumchea bhovtonnochem sonvsar ek nove ritin somzunk modot korunk xakta. Tem poilem bhirantikar dista, punn thodde porisromichea sangata, tumi tacher prabhutv mellovunk xaktat. Tor, vyayam korit ravat, proxn vicharit ravat ani calculus-achea ashchoryancho sod laitat ravat! Ani ugddas dovrat, tumi kednnaich addkholear poddlear, YouTube sadamch astach! Punnai utponn ani tutorials uplobdh asat. Subhechchha, ani tumchea proxekhatir 15/12/2024-ak ieunche khatir subhaxoi !
normalised: Nimannim, differential calculus ek bollvont vostu zaka tumkam tumchea vattenchi duniya novi vattentlean samzunk upakari zatali. Tem poilech veller dhompedd dista, punn thoddeam prayatnamni, tum tem jitun gheunk zata. Zalear, vapor kori, prashn vichari, ani calculus-chea achryank sodri! Ani ugddas dovri, tum kitlem atkli zalear, YouTube asa! Punn lectures ani tutorials mellonk zatat. Bhagevont vochunk tuka, ani tumchea exam-am khatir soglle bhagevont vochum, tumchio pandhra December don hazar ani vis charicher yetat!
